Articles.Content: Is there any MechJeb addon that allows me to launch directly from the surface to a interplanetary transfer/to a planet?
Launch to rendezvous might do it.  I am not entirely sure though.  I've used it in the past to launch direct-to-Mun/Minmus missions but not since back in .25.

I don't think it will be possible in one time, like what if the desired planet is out of reach? Sometimes, with a bit of luck and everything in the right place and time, you can target the desired body and do a Hohmann tranfer while waiting for circularization burn after a launch. I manage one or two with the Mün (...)

Edited February 20, 2016 by Benoit Hage
